column4: hello guys any news for Broadcom Corporation Device [14e4:4357] (rev 01) i ve got an hp2137 sl and aircrack (used for testing my wireless security)doesn' work with this card , when open driver will be avaible?(hope it isn't wrong talk about this but as i sad before it√¨s for legal testing)
best to get a pcmcia card that will work with you program, or replace the internet minipci card with one that will work
yeah i've been down that road before and it's really the easiest way to work around those issues
